name: JDM Tuner Racing
summary:
The game is a 2D simulation of drag racing.
It has a very realistic 2D physics, the car's realistic behavior and unpredictable opponent!
The game has an opportunity to upgrade your car to the full!
You can set the visual details to your car, putting a body kit or rear wing you improves the aerodynamics of your car!

name: JDG & le RPG
summary:
JDG & le RPG is a fan game that honors the world of Joueur du Grenier (and more generally to the French-speaking YouTube community) and comes after the third episode about RPGs.
It is a narrative game accompanied by a few classic turn-based battles, the real interest of the game is the references and jokes scattered throughout the story.

name: J.D. Arcades
summary:
J.D. Arcades is a collection of three games that contains:

UXB: You have to move around a maze to catch four tumblers, which are numbered and must be collected in the correct order. Once you have collected them all then you must get to the detonator before a fuse reaches it. If you collect the wrong tumbler or hit the fuse then it is game over.

Strategic Invaders: A Space Invaders clone where you control a base moving left or right, blasting aliens who are above in formation, moving across the screen, slowly descending downwards dropping bombs. Between your base and the aliens are shields which lose parts every time you hit one or the aliens do. One unique feature is that each position on the screen your base is on, only has nine shots. It is game over if you get hit by an aliens bomb or you allow them to land.

Laser Patrol: A side view shooter where you must move a spacecraft up or down to either avoid or blast asteroids that move across the screen from right to left. if you hit an asteroid then it is game over.

name: J.D. Spy
summary: J.D. Spy (short for "John Doe Spy") is a puzzle-adventure game that pulls you, an innocent civilian, into the midst of an international terrorist plot. To save your own life, you will be required to hack into secured computer systems, decode encrypted messages, decipher computer algorithms, examine photographs for clues, and much, much more.

name: JDM: Japanese Drift Master
summary: Welcome to Japan, the drift capital of the world! Compete, drift, and race on miles of varied roads and winding mountain trails. Drive through towns nestled at the scenic Haikama Lake. Spend your savings on new cars and get a taste of Japanese tuning style.

name: JDM: Rise of the Scorpion
summary: Experience the automotive culture of Japan with a free prologue to Japanese Drift Master. Learn about the story of the rebellious high schooler Hatori and race through the winding roads at Haikama Lake. Discover the places where drift was born!

name: JDM Pixel Street Car Racing
summary: Race fast, drift hard, and claim victory in pixel streets.

name: JDM Racing
summary: Drive legendary Japanese cars on various tracks. Beat records, take part in different racing events, rise from Beginner to Pro League driver. Collect, win, tune up, and upgrade your dream cars.

name: JDM Racing 2
summary: Drive legendary Japanese cars on various tracks. Beat records, take part in different racing events, rise from Beginner to Pro League driver. Collect, win, tune up, and upgrade your dream cars.

name: JDM Euphoria
summary: Feel the rush of '90s Japanese underground street racing. Trick out and trade cars, pimp your garages, and go head-to-head in sprints and drags. Carve your path to glory and make your mark in this immersive game!

name: JDM Drag Racing
summary:
JDM Tuner Racing is the game you have been waiting for to speed through the streets and let your potential flow.
Drag race and enjoy the opportunity to customize your air filter, exhaust, ECU, intake, head, pistons, turbo, gearbox, nitrous, tires and others.
The game lets you be in charge of the transmission so you can discover the underground in your own tuning. You chose the make, the color and all other details for your car so you can level up, earn money, and unlock more available features.
